name: The North Face Resolve 2 Jacket - Women's
description: On its own for protection from Spring showers, or layered with something warm for West coast winters, this lightweight rain shell will come in handy all year round. With its 2-layer waterproof breathable fabric and fully taped seams this shell will keep you dry even on the wettest days.2-layer waterproof breathable with DryVent™ technology and fully taped seams.Polyester mesh lining helps with airflow.Adjustable hood is stowable when you don’t need it.Zippered hand pockets.Front zipper has a storm flap that secures with Velcro®, keeping the warm in and the wet out.Elasticised cuffs and a cinchable hem seal out bad weather.
